entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fully support complex types with the InMemory provider #31464
  • How to define global query filter expression using multi tenancy/non entity values in IEntityTypeConfiguration implementations? #31459
  • FromSqlRaw not working for me in .net 6 #31457

Closed

  • Error when executing efbundle on Bitbucket Pipelines - System.IO.DirectoryNotFoundException: /opt/atlassian/pipelines/agent/build/Migrations/ #31466
  • Automatically query all data from DbSets in the order within the DbContext after calling SaveChanges #31452

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.35.2 to 3.35.3 #31463
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.2.0 to 8.2.1 #31462
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore from 7.0.9 to 7.0.10 #31461
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Query support for complex types #31460
